message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. However, $20,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to offer $8,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $17,000.
Alice, I understand the product holds value, but $17,000 is still  above my budget. I could go up to $10,000, which is my absolute limit.
